plot: Daniela, aka 'Dulce', returns home in search of a new beginning. Clean and sober for the first time, she dreams of a second chance at life and of finally being a mother to her young daughter Lola.
title: Dulce
plot_es: Daniela, aka 'Dulce', returns home in search of a new beginning. Clean and sober for the first time, she dreams of a second chance at life and of finally being a mother to her young daughter Lola.
plot_en: Daniela, aka 'Dulce', returns home in search of a new beginning. Clean and sober for the first time, she dreams of a second chance at life and of finally being a mother to her young daughter Lola.
